<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.connect" name="Connect" version="1.0.0" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" cache_flush="true" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_common"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angularui"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb"/> <import plugin="com.glide.notification.push"/> <import plugin="com.glide.db_audio"/> </requires>
<description>Connect</description>
<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_group" class="com.glide.connect.group.GroupsService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="conversation" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.ConversationService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_search" class="com.glide.connect.search.LiveSearchService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_notifications" class="com.glide.connect.notification.NotificationService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_actions" class="com.glide.connect.actions.ActionsService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="live_profile_service" class="com.glide.connect.profile.ProfileService" />
// deprecated services <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_message" class="com.glide.connect.message.ConnectMessageService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="collaborators" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.CollaborationService" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="connect_configuration" class="com.glide.connect.notification.ConnectConfigurationService" />
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ConnectActionResponse" class="com.glide.connect.actions.ConnectActionResponse"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="GlideConversation" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.GlideConversation"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Collaborator" class="com.glide.connect.conversation.Conversation"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Connect</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.connect</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Connect</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.connect/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.live_feed,com.glideapp.live_common,com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.ui.angularui,com.glide.ui.ng.amb,com.glide.notification.push,com.glide.db_audio</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.connect</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
